# availableVoices

**Type Property**

Provides the identifiers of the voices available on the system.

## Declaration

```swift
class var availableVoices: [NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceName] { get }
```

## Return Value

Array of strings representing the identifiers of each voice available on the system.

## Related Documentation

- **setVoice(_:)**: Sets the receiver’s current voice.

## Getting Speech Synthesizer Information

- **attributes(forVoice:)**: Provides the attribute dictionary of a voice.
- **defaultVoice**: Provides the identifier of the default voice.
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceName**
- **NSSpeechSynthesizer.VoiceAttributeKey**: The following constants are keys for the dictionary returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechSynthesizer/attributes(forVoice:)].

items.description: Provides the attribute dictionary of a voice.
items.name: attributes(forVoice:)

items.description: Provides the identifier of the default voice.
